title: About Alex - Senator Alex Padilla
snippet: Alex Padilla is a lifelong Californian. He was born and raised in the proud, working class community of Pacoima, in the San Fernando Valley. Alex’s parents immigrated to Los Angeles from different parts of Mexico in the 1960s.

title: Alex Padilla - Wikipedia
snippet: Alejandro "Alex" Padilla (born March 22, 1973) is an American politician serving as the senior United States senator from California, a seat he has held since 2021. A member of the Democratic Party, Padilla served as the 30th secretary of state of California from 2015 to 2021 and was a member ...

title: Meet Alex - Alex Padilla for U.S. Senate
snippet: Alex Padilla was born and raised in the proud working class community of Pacoima, California, in the San Fernando Valley.

title: Alex Padilla (D) - District 20 | California State Senate Archive
snippet: Padilla was not only the first Latino, but the youngest person ever elected city council president. He was unanimously re-elected twice and served as council president of America’s second largest city for 4 ½ years. He stepped down as council president on January 1, 2006 when he launched ...

title: Alex Padilla | Detained, Handcuffed, Kristi Noem, Education, & Facts | Britannica
snippet: Alex Padilla is a politician from California. In 2021 he became the first Latino to represent the state in the U.S. Senate. He was appointed to fill Kamala Harris’s seat after she stepped down to became vice president.
